name: Mango Ice Cream Recipe | Zarnak Sidhwa | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mango Ice Cream Recipe: Mangoes (peeled and chopped) 3-4 Cream 2 cups Condensed milk 1 can (14 oz) to Garnish: Mango (chopped in tiny cubes) 1 Cream whipped 1/2 cup
instructions: In a blender put the mango chunks, condensed milk and cream Blend till smooth and freeze in an air-tight tin. Remove once half set and beat up and again freeze. Repeat this method of letting ice cream set and then beating again 3 times. Freeze overnight and then serve scoops of mango ice cream with more chopped mangoes and cream piped if desired.
